name: Garen
title: The Might of Demacia
lore: A proud and noble warrior, Garen fights as one of the Dauntless Vanguard. He is popular among his fellows, and respected well enough by his enemies—not least as a scion of the prestigious Crownguard family, entrusted with defending Demacia and its ideals. Clad in magic-resistant armor and bearing a mighty broadsword, Garen stands ready to confront mages and sorcerers on the field of battle, in a veritable whirlwind of righteous steel.
blurb: A proud and noble warrior, Garen fights as one of the Dauntless Vanguard. He is popular among his fellows, and respected well enough by his enemies—not least as a scion of the prestigious Crownguard family, entrusted with defending Demacia and its...
allytips: Garen's regeneration greatly increases if he can avoid receiving damage for several seconds.
Judgment deals maximum damage when only hitting a single target. For effective trading, try to position such that only the enemy champion is hit.
Garen is only constrained by cooldowns, making items such as Black Cleaver very effective for him.
enemytips: Stack armor items to lower the large amount of physical damage that Garen deals out.
Try to run away from Garen as your health gets lower, as he can execute you quickly with Demacian Justice.
Be careful about attacking Garen in brush. It often will lead to taking full damage from Judgment.
Judgment deals maximum damage when only hitting a single target. If getting out of its radius isn't possible, move through allied minions to reduce damage taken.

riot_spell_q.name: Decisive Strike
riot_spell_q.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ e5 }} seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Courage
riot_spell_w.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e2 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ e4 }} seconds. For the first {{ e7 }} seconds, he takes {{ e6 }}% less damage and gains {{ e5 }}% Tenacity. For the remaining duration, he takes {{ e3 }}% less damage.

riot_spell_e.name: Judgment
riot_spell_e.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Enemy champions hit by {{ e6 }} spins lose {{ e5 }}% of their armor for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

label: Base Damage per hit
Total Attack Damage Ratio per hit

riot_spell_r.name: Demacian Justice
riot_spell_r.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional {{ e3 }}% of its maximum health as true damage.

Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.

riot_spell_i.name: Perseverance
riot_spell_i.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

wikia_skill_i1.blurb: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Garen''' passively [[Health regeneration|regenerates]]{{ft|{{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|2|showtype=true|0.2;0.8|1;11|key=%}} '''maximum''' health}}}} every half-second|{{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|2|showtype=true|0.2*10;0.8*10|1;11|key=%}} '''maximum''' health}} every 5 seconds}}}}and is doubled to{{ft|{{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|2|showtype=true|0.2*2;0.8*2|1;11|key=%}} '''maximum''' health}}}} every half-second|{{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|2|showtype=true|0.2*2*10;0.8*2*10|1;11|key=%}} '''maximum''' health}}}} every 5 seconds}}while below {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|2|showtype=true|25;50|1;11|key=%}} of his '''maximum''' health}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: This regeneration is interrupted for {{pp|2|showtype=true|9;4|1;11}} seconds if he takes non-[[minion]] damage or if he is hit by an enemy [[Champion ability|ability]].
wikia_skill_i1.description3: At level 11, damage from non-epic [[monster]]s will no longer stop ''Perseverance''.

wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' cleanses himself of all {{tip|slow|slows}} affecting him and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a few seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Additionally, his next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|4.5}} seconds deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, and {{tip|silence|silences}} his target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.line_22: * ''Decisive Strike'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Garen's'' previous orders.
wikia_skill_q1.line_23: ** The on-hit effect and the bonus movement speed are independent (''Garen'' can silence his target and the bonus movement speed will remain, duration permitting).
wikia_skill_q1.line_24: * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
wikia_skill_q1.line_25: * As with most on-hit physical damage, ''Decisive Strike's'' bonus damage will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
wikia_skill_q1.line_26: ** It will not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}}.
wikia_skill_q1.line_28: * ''Decisive Strike'' will also remove {{tip|cripple}} in case it is inextricably linked with {{tip|slow}} within the ability used against ''Garen''.
wikia_skill_q1.line_29: ** For example, it will remove {{tip|cripple}} from {{cai|Wither|Nasus}}, but not from {{cai|Ground Slam|Malphite}}.
wikia_skill_q1.line_30: * ''Decisive Strike'' will remove {{tip|slow}} from {{si|Exhaust}}, but not the damage reduction, for it being two separate effects within one summoner spell.
wikia_skill_q1.line_31: * ''Decisive Strike'' does not protect ''Garen'' from re-application of {{tip|slow|slows}} on him.
wikia_skill_q1.line_32: ** [[Area of effect]] {{tip|slow|slows}} (like {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) are re-applied immediately after removing if ''Garen'' stays in the corresponding area.
wikia_skill_q1.line_33: * Both {{ii|Statikk Shiv}} and {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} have weird interactions with ''Garen's'' ''Decisive Strike''.
wikia_skill_q1.line_34: ** {{ii|Statikk Shiv}} procs in the middle of ''Garen's'' ''Decisive Strike'' animation and will never crit, even if at 100% crit or using {{ii|Stormrazor}}.
wikia_skill_q1.line_35: ** {{ii|Rapid Firecannon|Rapid Firecannon's}} bonus range is not applied to ''Garen's'' ''Decisive Strike'' and the damage procs before the animation starts.

wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Garen''' permanently gains {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} every time he kills an enemy unit, up to a maximum of 40 '''bonus''' resistances at 160 unit kills.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' reduces incoming damage by 60% and has 60% {{sti|[[Tenacity]]}} for the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds. For the rest of the duration '''Garen''' reduces incoming damage by 30%.
wikia_skill_w1.line_13: * ''Courage'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Garen's''' previous orders.
wikia_skill_w1.line_14: * ''Courage's'' bonus resistances are only gained when it is ranked up at least once, but ''Courage's'' passive is retroactive.
wikia_skill_w1.line_15: * Any enemy unit counts towards ''Courage's'' bonus resistances: champions, minions, monsters (including epic ones), [[Champion summoned units|summoned units]] and turrets. The bonus is equal in all these cases.
wikia_skill_w1.line_16: * ''Courage'' will only grant bonus resistances from units killed by '''Garen''' himself. {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} and {{ii|Zz'Rot Portal}} do not count.

wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' rapidly spins his sword around his body {{ft|{{pp|6|5 to 10|1 to 16}} times|every {{pp|6|3/5 to 3/10|1 to 16}} seconds}} for 3 seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each spin to nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Spin|{{ap|14 to 30}} {{as|(+ {{ap|36 to 40}}% AD)}}|Single-Target Damage Per Spin|{{ap|14*1.33 to 30*1.33}} {{as|(+ {{ap|36*1.33 to 40*1.33}}% AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description3: ''Judgment'' deals 33% bonus damage when hitting a single target and can {{tip|critical strike|{{as|critically strike}}}} for {{as|50% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_e1.description4: Enemy champions hit 4 times have their {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor reduced by 25%}}}} for 6 seconds. Hits after the 4th refresh the duration of the debuff.
wikia_skill_e1.description5: After 1 second, '''Garen''' can reactivate to cancel it immediately, reducing its cooldown by its remaining duration.
wikia_skill_e1.line_24: * ''Judgment'' is not a [[channel]]ed ability, so crowd control effects will not interrupt it.
wikia_skill_e1.line_25: ** Silencing ''Garen'' will prevent him from deactivating the ability early.
wikia_skill_e1.line_26: * ''Garen'' will benefit from {{ais|Decisive Strike|Garen}} slow removal and bonus movement speed while ''Judgment'' is active.
wikia_skill_e1.line_27: * ''Judgment'' cancels ''Garen's'' last movement command upon ending.
wikia_skill_e1.line_28: ** He will not be able to apply its on-hit silence or bonus damage since he cannot basic attack over ''Judgment's'' duration.
wikia_skill_e1.line_29: * ''Garen'' may cast {{ai|Demacian Justice|Garen}} while ''Judgment'' is active but it will stop ticking if so.
wikia_skill_e1.line_30: * Each spin deals damage simultaneously to all enemies within its range when the spin is completed.

wikia_skill_e2.blurb: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
wikia_skill_e2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' rapidly spins his sword around his body {{ft|{{pp|6|5 to 10|1 to 16}} times|every {{pp|6|3/5 to 3/10|1 to 16}} seconds}} for 3 seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each spin to nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_e2.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Spin|{{ap|14 to 30}} {{as|(+ {{ap|36 to 40}}% AD)}}|Single-Target Damage Per Spin|{{ap|14*1.33 to 30*1.33}} {{as|(+ {{ap|36*1.33 to 40*1.33}}% AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_e2.description3: ''Judgment'' deals 33% bonus damage when hitting a single target and can {{tip|critical strike|{{as|critically strike}}}} for {{as|50% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_e2.description4: Enemy champions hit 4 times have their {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor reduced by 25%}}}} for 6 seconds. Hits after the 4th refresh the duration of the debuff.
wikia_skill_e2.description5: After 1 second, '''Garen''' can reactivate to cancel it immediately, reducing its cooldown by its remaining duration.
wikia_skill_e2.line_24: * ''Judgment'' is not a [[channel]]ed ability, so crowd control effects will not interrupt it.
wikia_skill_e2.line_25: ** Silencing ''Garen'' will prevent him from deactivating the ability early.
wikia_skill_e2.line_26: * ''Garen'' will benefit from {{ais|Decisive Strike|Garen}} slow removal and bonus movement speed while ''Judgment'' is active.
wikia_skill_e2.line_27: * ''Judgment'' cancels ''Garen's'' last movement command upon ending.
wikia_skill_e2.line_28: ** He will not be able to apply its on-hit silence or bonus damage since he cannot basic attack over ''Judgment's'' duration.
wikia_skill_e2.line_29: * ''Garen'' may cast {{ai|Demacian Justice|Garen}} while ''Judgment'' is active but it will stop ticking if so.
wikia_skill_e2.line_30: * Each spin deals damage simultaneously to all enemies within its range when the spin is completed.

wikia_skill_r1.blurb: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion. Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} The enemy with the most kills in the last 5 minutes is marked as the ''Villain''. The mark cannot be assigned to another champion while '''Garen''' is in combat with the ''Villain''. If more than one enemy has the same bounty, the enemy who received it first is marked the ''Villain''.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: '''Garen's''' basic attacks and each spin of {{ai|Judgment|Garen}} against the ''Villain'' deal {{as|1% of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} [[on-hit]].
wikia_skill_r1.description3: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute the target enemy champion, dealing them {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}, converted to {{as|true damage}} when targeting the ''Villain''.
wikia_skill_r1.line_22: * The tooltip displays damage values as simple digits rather than percentages (deals 1 additional damage per {{as|{{ap|3.5|3|2.5}} target's '''missing''' health}}).
wikia_skill_r1.line_23: * Kills against ''Garen'' will not be considered when determining the ''Villain''.
wikia_skill_r1.line_24: * ''Villains'' that can be executed by this spell, will have their ''Villain'' icon highlighted.
wikia_skill_r1.line_25: * The ability will not complete and will not go on cooldown if the target moves out of '''Garen's''' vision or it becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
